entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
